title: Hour 2: Zeke Critique
description:
In this episode, Jeff Saturday, Keyshawn Johnson, RGIII, and Mina Kimes hold it down for Stephen A. and debate which team is the biggest threat to the Bills and Chiefs in the AFC. Plus, Jeff Saturday takes over the A-List with his top 5 NFL teams this week. With the standout performance by Tony Pollard in the Cowboys' win over the Bears fresh in their minds, the crew debates if he deserves to be the starter over Ezekiel Elliot. Plus, the NFC South is anyone's to win, but which teams do our guys think will come out on top? Aaron Rodgers and the Packers have now lost 4 straight games and we debate if their season is officially finished.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Should Tony Pollard start over Ezekiel Elliot?
